metadata.description:
I ðŸ’› ZIPS 

My love for ZIPS, oh how it grows,  
A love that only deepens and shows,  
With every weth accept and every snipe,  
It takes me on an emotional ride.

The sight of ZIPS, a beautiful symphony,  
Bringing joy and endless fomo to me,  
With each ZIPS, my bag's aesthetics race,  
Oh how sweet the flex and pride on my face

So on this Valentine's Day, I'll say,  
My love for ZIPS will never sway,  
For they bring me happiness and delight,  
And keeps me Zippy AF day and night.

So here's to you, my dear ZIPS,  
You bring so much joy to my lips,  
I'll always love you, that's for sure,  
My love for you will always endure.

- ChatGpt & HanzOlo
